Who?

I am an award-winning author of technical books on Ruby, Rails and Elixir. These books have a combined sales total of over 15,000 copies.

I am the Junior Engineering Program Lead at Culture Amp. It's my responsibility to mentor new developers into the confident and capable developers of the future.

You might know me from the books I've written, my open source work, the things I've done in my career as an author / developer, my addiction to Stack Overflow or The Rails Guides that I helped write.

If you're interested, you can see what I'm doing now.
